0095a39b2059c44bb70fc7e26c567227deae1dd6.query:
SELECT
                  EXISTS(
                    SELECT
                      hash
                    FROM
                      blocks_next
                    WHERE
                      number = $1
                  ) AS "exists!"

017c881da2ebcd080ea65a96821f8a4320e7e839.query:
SELECT
                    number
                FROM
                    blocks_next
                ORDER BY number DESC
                LIMIT 1

28409ca2bee68e0969632f7278e521cae6fb20ec.query:
SELECT slot FROM beacon_states
                ORDER BY slot ASC

36b6169564ef841d5cfe8e64835534b1156ac30c.query:
SELECT
                    base_fee_per_gas,
                    difficulty,
                    gas_used,
                    hash,
                    number,
                    parent_hash,
                    timestamp,
                    total_difficulty::TEXT AS "total_difficulty!"
                FROM
                    blocks_next
                WHERE
                    number = $1

36ceca3d7486bb5eafb2a8146c181adf99b6f216.query:
SELECT
                DISTINCT ON (DATE_TRUNC('day', timestamp)) DATE_TRUNC('day', timestamp) AS "day_timestamp!",
                gwei
            FROM
                beacon_validators_balance
            ORDER BY
                DATE_TRUNC('day', timestamp), timestamp ASC

373699992ba24383ca449966a910ff1caae73a25.query:
SELECT
                effective_balance_sum
            FROM
                beacon_states
            WHERE
                state_root = $1

3c67ace6a2b28b5e75e850ea2a32d292a3ea5552.query:
INSERT INTO key_value_store (key, value) VALUES ($1, $2::jsonb)
            ON CONFLICT (key) DO UPDATE SET
                value = excluded.value

3d161e6a7b26b1759ada2a5102c9fa5e4fdf75b0.query:
DELETE FROM beacon_validators_balance
            WHERE state_root IN (
                SELECT state_root FROM beacon_states
                WHERE slot >= $1
            )

4152578f52c9f12405fd196bc8a4d3417eae9587.query:
SELECT
                COUNT(*) AS "count!"
            FROM
                beacon_blocks
            WHERE
                slot >= $1

440e3270c27b7133ca07349f03510777f0218e8a.query:
UPDATE
                beacon_blocks
            SET
                block_hash = $1
            WHERE
                block_root = $2

44bc5d5d6512783fdf6ec5ba29175d768730e11d.query:
DELETE FROM beacon_issuance
            WHERE state_root IN (
                SELECT state_root FROM beacon_states
                WHERE slot >= $1
            )

4f33c5d4b851b645f1e49b3666841146232c9979.query:
SELECT
                state_root
            FROM
                beacon_states
            WHERE
                slot = $1

585180658f733f6d35d6043550a2c5b797bc3b7f.query:
SELECT
                block_root,
                state_root,
                parent_root,
                deposit_sum,
                deposit_sum_aggregated,
                block_hash
            FROM
                beacon_blocks
            WHERE
                block_root = $1

5a9991cfa269fecff4a565d678de83b2549066e5.query:
SELECT
                block_root
            FROM
                beacon_states 
            JOIN
                beacon_blocks 
            ON
                beacon_states.state_root = beacon_blocks.state_root 
            WHERE beacon_states.slot <= $1
            ORDER BY beacon_states.slot DESC 
            LIMIT 1

622a4e700745a450c178d411239781e6319ad98f.query:
SELECT
                deposit_sum_aggregated
            FROM
                beacon_blocks
            WHERE
                block_root = $1

6c03cd0877ee34a84787bc829f95a37ecc89d465.query:
INSERT INTO
                beacon_states
                (state_root, slot, associated_block_root)
            VALUES ($1, $2, $3)

6e3427b92b80bc6d01fe740bf9a20a484dd1725d.query:
SELECT
                beacon_states.slot
            FROM
                beacon_blocks
            JOIN
                beacon_states
            ON
                beacon_states.state_root = beacon_blocks.state_root
            ORDER BY slot DESC
            LIMIT 1

6e5840a62473818a418e10adb6ba3c8808a9f057.query:
DELETE FROM beacon_blocks
            WHERE state_root IN (
                SELECT
                    state_root
                FROM
                    beacon_states
                WHERE beacon_states.slot >= $1
            )

872177b7547af8196a990b8de0a381be7b069465.query:
SELECT value FROM key_value_store
            WHERE key = $1

88b950efda6150dc3a044420e67b11138cd14fbf.query:
INSERT INTO key_value_store (key, value) VALUES ($1, $2)
            ON CONFLICT (key) DO UPDATE SET
                value = excluded.value

8ecdb845a8d20242d267393d5c79173f8de281f8.query:
SELECT
                    slot,
                    state_root
                FROM
                    beacon_states
                WHERE
                    slot >= $1
                AND
                    slot <= $2
                ORDER BY
                    slot ASC

95f051861a5ca96b593acc398f7f29d5c8ca859e.query:
SELECT
                      EXISTS(
                        SELECT
                          hash
                        FROM
                          blocks_next
                        WHERE
                          hash = $1
                      ) AS "exists!"

a4bf0e17e9910b415ae41bc7abfa00053fa3ed6c.query:
SELECT
                beacon_states.state_root,
                beacon_states.slot,
                beacon_blocks.block_root AS "block_root?"
            FROM beacon_states
            LEFT JOIN beacon_blocks ON beacon_states.state_root = beacon_blocks.state_root
            ORDER BY slot DESC
            LIMIT 1

afcdf2723131331fa33290904bd69c0b3c49033b.query:
UPDATE
                beacon_states
            SET
                effective_balance_sum = $1
            WHERE
                state_root = $2

b79657a733d30eefccec9ce166c8a3fffce30292.query:
INSERT INTO beacon_blocks (
                block_hash,
                block_root,
                deposit_sum,
                deposit_sum_aggregated,
                parent_root,
                slot,
                state_root
            )
            VALUES (
                $1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7
            )

b7bb6881fa2d0a591071a9f538fddfb4d2ee6bb4.query: INSERT INTO beacon_issuance (timestamp, state_root, gwei) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)

c3e675178c9b93119e5298a613b1c84cd0847ad3.query:
SELECT
                    COUNT(*) AS "count!"
                FROM
                    blocks_next
                LIMIT 1

c49edba8e1bcb02e70d7d19ded33b9c77e5ceb14.query: INSERT INTO beacon_validators_balance (timestamp, state_root, gwei) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)

db24538a9bb9300a9837788746af27d056d3d06b.query:
SELECT
                block_root,
                slot AS "slot!"
            FROM
                beacon_blocks
            WHERE
                slot >= $1

db7b7fa09a36c2216aaa8ca90270fce68e90be39.query:
WITH
              issuance_distances AS (
                SELECT
                  gwei,
                  timestamp,
                  ABS(
                    EXTRACT(
                      epoch
                      FROM
                        (timestamp - (NOW() - '7 days':: INTERVAL))
                    )
                  ) AS distance_seconds
                FROM
                  beacon_issuance
                ORDER BY
                  distance_seconds ASC
              )
            SELECT gwei
            FROM issuance_distances 
            WHERE distance_seconds <= 86400
            LIMIT 1

dee40e6dd15adfc421012d85806bf7e7ce55ac6e.query:
SELECT
                    base_fee_per_gas,
                    difficulty,
                    gas_used,
                    hash,
                    number,
                    parent_hash,
                    timestamp,
                    total_difficulty::TEXT AS "total_difficulty!"
                FROM
                    blocks_next
                WHERE
                    hash = $1

e7fe80e33064951d3e22fc7a1868b50257db8acd.query:
SELECT
                DISTINCT ON (DATE_TRUNC('day', timestamp)) DATE_TRUNC('day', timestamp) AS "day_timestamp!",
                gwei
            FROM
                beacon_issuance
            ORDER BY
                DATE_TRUNC('day', timestamp), timestamp ASC

febfe61a125d3cb2bc555027c602842386096975.query:
SELECT
                gwei
            FROM
                beacon_issuance
            ORDER BY
                timestamp DESC
            LIMIT 1
